hell i even play 8ball pool on mini clip
[/quote]

I suggest you quit calling yourself a hardcore gamer, you… poser.[/quote]i run minesweeper hacked lobbies. i don’t need to be ranked.

on a serious note - so i don’t get another infraction - i’m looking to build a gaming desktop by the summer.
can’t get much gaming on my mac, and my laptop is blown to shit.

item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“HcoJustin, post:31, topic:540227”]I don’t know where all of the Win 8 hate comes from. After using it for a few months I can’t stand to go back.[/quote]I fully agree, updated to Windows 8.1 and have used it since around July-Septemberish. Has been an amazing experience. I did have a small issue with my graphics driver and the OS at one point but that has since had a patch for it.

item.title: Your gaming rig
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

amd fx6300 six cores
8 gb ddr3
windows 7 ultimate 64 bit
gtx 630

As much as I like intel more than amd, I didn’t have much to build with so I had to go with amd, and the graphics card is pretty low end too but it gets the job done for every game I play until I upgrade it at least.

item.title: Your gaming rig
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

I thought the same as well but after getting used to Windows 8, it is a lot of nifty features that I really miss when going back to Windows 7. You’re definitely right about the ‘not meant for desktops’. The ways to get to different interfaces is so awkwardly placed that I usually spend more time than I should when doing something simple such as searching for a document.

dat boot time tho

Read full topic

item.title: Your gaming rig
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

Honestly the fact that yours has Win8 makes it less impressive ._.
I don’t like to hate on it too much because it has some exceptional qualities but I really don’t think it was meant for desktop usage; win7 is just better overall if you don’t have a touchscreen

item.description:

rune-pk that desktop needs a lot more ram wow

I never use it lol I am only using it cause my hard drive crashed in the laptop
[/quote]Adding more RAM to a P4 isn’t going to really change anything…
[/quote]He’s probably one of those people that thinks more RAM solves everything.

If you are talking to me that is not what I think I use the computer to watch movies on haha why upgrade when I have a great laptop ?? I don’t get it[/quote]
No I think they meant me; I assumed the processor had more than one core. I don’t really affiliate myself with intel nearly as much as amd honestly. I’m also not educated on older models.
